title: Wifi turning on problem
content: Hello, I've google pixel 3 xl, and 3 days ago,  I started having wifi problems, so basically the slider won't go to on, its stuck on turning on and then it disables itself, I tried literally everything, safe mode, airplane mode, developer mode, reset, factory reset and now after a factory reset I can't even start my phone because it asks me to connect to wifi to continue google setup and I can't connect lol
